# SOTA Agent Memory System

> A production-grade memory system for AI agents with semantic search (ChromaDB), task-aware context loading, and 80% token compression. Install with one command: `curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Xzeroone/agent-memory-system/main/install.sh | bash`

## Core Concepts

- **Semantic Search**: Vector embeddings (all-MiniLM-L6-v2) enable finding relevant memories by meaning, not keywords. Powered by ChromaDB.
- **Task-aware Loading**: Context level automatically chosen based on task type (debug/create/learn) and available token budget.
- **Memory Compression**: Auto-generated compact context (~3KB) saves 80%+ tokens compared to full context.
- **Single Source Files**: No duplication - USER, AGENT, MODELS profiles stored once in `memory/profiles/`.

## Scripts

- [context-loader.sh](templates/scripts/context-loader.sh): Main entry point - `context-loader.sh smart "task"`
- [semantic-search.sh](templates/scripts/semantic-search.sh): Vector search - `semantic-search.sh search "query"`
- [memory-embeddings.py](templates/scripts/memory-embeddings.py): ChromaDB embedding service
- [generate-compact-context.sh](templates/scripts/generate-compact-context.sh): Compress memory
- [summarize-session.sh](templates/scripts/summarize-session.sh): Archive old sessions
